title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9770.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9770.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The New York Local Government Assistance Corporation has
adopted the following rules and regulations in conformance with Public

Authorities Law, section 2880 for the purpose of implementing its prompt
payment policy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9770.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
